info.description: All about Numbers. REST access with json/xml/jsonp result support. Below is the documentation for the Numbers API. You can try them out right here. Find more information and subscribe at [math.tools](https://math.tools/api/numbers/)
info.title: Numbers API

tags.name: Number of the day
tags.description: Number of the day. This API is free (rate limited).

tags.name: Number Facts
tags.description: Get random interesting fact about a given number.

tags.name: Spell
tags.description: Spell out a number ordinal, cardinal or currency. This API is free (rate limited).

tags.name: Base Conversion
tags.description: Convert from one base to another. This API is free (rate limited).

tags.name: Number Systems Conversion
tags.description: Convert from one number system to another.

tags.name: Prime
tags.description: Things to do with Prime numbers

tags.name: PI
tags.description: Digits of PI and more.This API is free (rate limited).

tags.name: Number Checks
tags.description: Check Property of a given number.

parameters.description: Minimum Number value in the range
parameters.name: min

parameters.description: Total number of random numbers to generate. Defaults to 1
parameters.name: total
